parameters.description: Valid values are `true` or `false` and defaults to `true`. When a value of `true` is passed, any domains associated with each scheduled job will have expanded properties including `name` and `type`. When a value of `false` is passed, these same domains will only return as a list of `objectid`s.
parameters.name: hydrate_domains

parameters.description: Valid values are `true` or `false` and defaults to `true`. When a value of `true` is passed, any OUs associated with each scheduled job will have expanded properties including `name` and `type`. When a value of `false` is passed, these same OUs will only return as a list of `objectid`s.
parameters.name: hydrate_ous
